title: Modern 2 Bed in Allston! Private Balcony! Available 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 122734680', 'Rent: $5,200 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Parking:: street parking', "Sunny 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment in Allston right next to Packard's Corner is available to tour!", 'Steps to tons of restaurants and shops!', 'Boston University and Star Marker along with public transit are right nearby too!', 'This unit features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Sunny views of Boston', '- Spacious rooms', '- Private balcony', '- Renovated kitchen', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Dishwasher', '- Updated bathrooms', '- Laundry on site', 'Reach out now for more information!', 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 66 Cambridge St @ Lincoln St (0.33 mi)', "Tram: B Packard's Corner (0.10 mi)", 'Bus: 57 19 Brighton Ave (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Cambridge St @ N Harvard St (0.32 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ N Harvard St (0.32 mi)', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
